oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A note describing the excising of poisoned flesh from a wound. The flesh is warm and moves when alive but gets cold and dies. 1) See also The Mantis turned into a hartebeest, 2) This story is found in Book XXIV.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: When a man's flesh moves
